last_episode_to_air.name: The Payback
last_episode_to_air.overview: Tray excitedly prepares for his kids' graduation but is interrupted by an illicit request from Percy. After Tray helps a student out of a jam, Veesy begins to see Tray in a new light. Shahzad stresses over having to give a graduation speech.

name: The Last O.G.
overview: An ex-felon is shocked to see just how much the world has changed when he is released from prison for good behavior after a 15-year stint and returns to his newly gentrified Brooklyn neighborhood.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Ex-con Tray is shocked to see how much the world has changed when he's released from prison for good behavior after a 15-year stint.

episodes.name: Bobo Beans
episodes.overview: After getting turned down for a job at a high-end restaurant, Tray stumbles into a position at a chain coffee shop. The twist - it's owned by Wavy, the drug dealer that Tray took the fall for.

episodes.name: Truth Safari
episodes.overview: Tray and Cousin Bobby intercept the kids at school and take them on a trip down memory lane. Shay tries to track down the kids, and Josh reminds Shay that it's her lie that disrupted the family dynamic.

episodes.name: Swipe Right
episodes.overview: Cousin Bobby convinces Tray to try Tinder. Tray lands a great match but realizes that he's not emotionally ready for a new relationship.

episodes.name: Repass
episodes.overview: Unbeknownst to Shay, Tray was invited to her mother's funeral reception, much to her disapproval. Tray stands up for Shay when her family gives her a hard time about not being there in her mother's later years.

episodes.name: Tray-Ning Day
episodes.overview: Tray attempts to teach his son Shazad how to be a man.

episodes.name: Lemon Drops
episodes.overview: In an effort to support the homeless shelter at which Shay volunteers much of her time, Tray resorts to old methods of raising quick funds.

episodes.name: That Backslide
episodes.overview: Left reeling from the error of his ways, Tray goes into a tailspin and turns to Bobby for support.

episodes.name: Paid In Full
episodes.overview: Flashback episode of the entire day leading up to Tray's arrest that culminates in present day Tray deciding to pay Wavy back for the years he lost.

episodes.name: Clemenza
episodes.overview: Tray enlists the halfway house gang to try and take Wavy out before coming to the realization that Wavy isn't the one to blame for his arrest.

episodes.name: Ladies First
episodes.overview: Tray wants to see the twins' birth video, and searching for it brings back emotional memories for Shay.

episodes.name: Git Up Git Out & Git Something
episodes.overview: Tray finds part-time work in the cafeteria of the kids’ school and finds himself more determined than ever to make it as a chef. Shay straightens Josh out after he tells her that sometimes she “goes off” and scares white people.

episodes.name: A Roller Skating Jam Named Saturdays
episodes.overview: Shay rededicates a neighborhood landmark and reconnects with her old skate crew. Tray and Bobby get caught up helping an OWL (old white lady) in distress.

episodes.name: Scenario
episodes.overview: Bobby blows an important loan meeting for Tray, who has to reconsider his business relationship with his cousin. Shay drags Amira to a birthday party so she can spend time with her new friend Faith.

episodes.name: Sound of Da Police
episodes.overview: Josh and Tray have different experiences teaching Shahzad to drive, and he learns a hard lesson about privilege.

episodes.name: Keep Their Heads Ringing
episodes.overview: Tray takes Shahzad to visit his old barbershop. Shay deals with Amira's recent behavior problems.

episodes.name: Criminal Minded
episodes.overview: A neighborhood tough named BAMF threatens Josh and levies a \"tax\" on the food truck. Tray reconnects with another O.G. in an attempt to learn the new code of the street. Bobby has a new girlfriend, but she comes with more baggage than he imagined.

episodes.name: Mama Said Knock You Out
episodes.overview: On Mother's Day, Tray tries to make amends with his mom, who threw him out of the house 30 years ago.

episodes.name: Your Mom's in My Business
episodes.overview: Shay quits her job and turns her energies to Tray's food truck. Bobby gets a new job as an exterminator.

episodes.name: Fight The Power
episodes.overview: The food truck crew enters a neighborhood competition. Tray tries to save an old apartment building.

episodes.name: Lookin at the Front Door
episodes.overview: After six months of crashing at his mom’s house, Tray leaves the nest in search of a place of his own, but he must first get some sage advice from a wise OG on how to battle the demons of his past.

episodes.name: Started From the Bottom
episodes.overview: Tray meets his neighbors as he settles into his new apartment. Meanwhile, Shay has mixed feelings when she learns that Shahzad’s “queen” is a white girl.

episodes.name: Ballin
episodes.overview: Tray takes Shahzad to his first basketball game and teaches him how to finesse his way to courtside seats. Josh feels insecure about his relationship with Shahzad and worries that he's not the cool Dad anymore.

episodes.name: They Reminisce Over You
episodes.overview: Tray and his family go on a city-wide hunt for an old pair of Air Jordan's after Tray discovers that they are worth big bank.

episodes.name: Family Feud
episodes.overview: It's Thanksgiving and Tray is cooking up beef with his long-time rival and cousin, Fred. Meanwhile, Amira and Shahzad get to know the good, bad and ugly sides of their family.

episodes.name: The Breaks
episodes.overview: When Shay finally gets a big break in her career, Tray and the family grapple with the huge changes that it will mean for them all.

episodes.name: In Da Club
episodes.overview: When Tray's relationship advice to Paul fails, Tray and company decide to take him out to the club so he can let loose and find himself.

episodes.name: Come Clean
episodes.overview: Tray is convinced that his mother's younger boyfriend Carl is cheating on her and goes out of his way to prove it by catching him in the act.

episodes.name: All I Need
episodes.overview: Tray finds a new love and is faced with the realities of dating with his checkered past.

episodes.name: Warning
episodes.overview: Cousin Bobby is accused of being a snitch after being released from prison early, and Tray faces a formidable bully in his new girlfriend's ex-husband, who is a cop.

episodes.name: Staying Alive
episodes.overview: After he's shot while getting jumped, Tray finds himself in a coma. His family's prayers are answered when he wakes up but he finds himself confined to a wheelchair.

episodes.name: The First Hump Is the Hardest
episodes.overview: With Wavy's help, Tray tracks down the person who shot him to set things straigh. Jasmine has second thoughts about her relationship with Tray.

episodes.name: Tray Finds His Purpose
episodes.overview: Tray lobbies for and gets a job at Wavy's new restaurant, where he meets an old foe.

episodes.name: If You Can't Buy, Rent
episodes.overview: After Veesy declines his help, Tray decides to get enough signatures to keep the community center open in secret.

episodes.name: Helping Is Hard
episodes.overview: Tray begins teaching at the community center and training Javi in boxing until his mother shows up, angry he's been skipping school.

episodes.name: The Negotiator
episodes.overview: Tray's cooking class is interrupted when a young man named Demar comes to tell his pregnant girlfriend Felicia they have to run from the police.

episodes.name: Smush
episodes.overview: After they find a suspicious hat in Amira's room, Tray and Josh decide to follow her and find out whose it is.

episodes.name: Know Thyself
episodes.overview: Amira attends college presentations, and her quick decision surprises Tray, who then works to guide Amira toward a better understanding of her identity. While cleaning out Roberta's storage unit, Shahzad makes a discovery about her past.

episodes.name: The Squared Circle
episodes.overview: Veesy convinces a Brooklyn artist to paint a mural for the community center. Tray approaches Mark Breland and Teddy Atlas to train Javi. When Javi lands a fight that conflicts with prom, Josh steps in to help Amira. Shahzad makes a special promposal.

episodes.name: The Payback
episodes.overview: Tray excitedly prepares for his kids' graduation but is interrupted by an illicit request from Percy. After Tray helps a student out of a jam, Veesy begins to see Tray in a new light. Shahzad stresses over having to give a graduation speech.
